text:
- If you think about the
business that we're in,

really understanding
our customer's business

and making them more successful
is what makes us successful.
- Infor is the industry ERP cloud company.
Our mission is to generate productivity

and better business
outcomes for our customers
across a variety of industries,
from healthcare to manufacturing,
to distribution and public sector.

- What makes Infor very
different is our industry focus.

Most of our competitors
write a single product
that can be sold to any industry.
We actually have multiple products,
each of which is written
for a specific subset of industries.

So when we set out to build
our software for the cloud,
like many companies, we had a choice.
We could not just build the software,

but we could also go
and build data centers
to run the software.

And the thought of trying
to do that on our own
really made no sense.
That's just not what we're good at.

And the idea that we
could partner with someone
who's extraordinary at that,
who has the best security around,

who can make sure that
uptime is unmatched,

who can put data centers
anywhere in the world,

we view it as a huge
competitive advantage.
It was also a great cultural fit.
Both companies really have the customer
at the center of everything that they do.
And that makes a big difference
when we're building technology together.
- Keeping the customer front and center
really helps us to then deliver
that superior customer experience.

There's been a tremendous
shift in the marketplace,

with companies wanting to adopt
more of a digital strategy
and really move way faster than they were.
Of course, that means that we also in turn
have to think faster.

- We understand that
customers are struggling

to keep pace with the world
that's changing faster each day.

To help our customers stay
competitive in their industries

and enable them to break new
ground for their businesses,
our technology needs to be fast, scalable,
and provide real ROI.
It also needs to help our customers
drive their own innovation.
To deliver that,

we're not only taking
advantage of the infrastructure
provided by AWS,

we're also taking advantage
of the web services,

everything from SageMaker,
which powers our AI platform,
to mobility extensions in Edge computing,

we're partnering with
them to deliver richer

and more complete solutions
to better meet the needs
of every one of our customers,
including world-class security
and built-in disaster recovery.

- We believe that we
have unique advantage,

because the solutions
are industry specific.
We can go deeper in functionality.
And if I apply AI and ML on that data,
I can actually provide better solutions
that either optimizes, advises,
or automates the process for that industry
with much better meaning.

That brings new opportunities
for our customers,

which brings new opportunities
for AWS and Infor.

If we can jointly continue
to innovate together,
which is going to be an exciting journey
over the next five, 10 years.
- What we're selling

isn't just technology
products or software,

but frankly, it's
visibility, it's agility,

and it's a better understanding
of their business.
It really is that notion

of how can we give them more
access and more insights
from their data, from their processes,

from their relationships
with their customers
and their suppliers.
That's where the future is,
and the more agility we can infuse
in our customer's businesses,
the more successful they'll be.
